item.title: Version 5.4.0
item.description:
Focusmo 5.4.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Floating Button Mode: Quickly view your top 3 tasks at a glance
  • Enhanced Activity Tracking Screen: Redesigned with a more minimal and intuitive interface
    • Monitor app and website activity during each task
    • 100% accurate tracking with 1-second precision
  • Smart Backlog: New backlog system with seamless task restoration
  • Reset Timer: Reset task time and start fresh whenever needed
  • Improved Visual Cues: Color-coded resume indicators and timer type chips at the bottom
  • Streamlined Onboarding: New getting started flow to help users set up app features effortlessly
  • Universal Drag to Focus: Hold Fn and drag from any application

Performance Improvements

  • Enhanced timeline performance for smoother navigation
  • Optimized analytics with intelligent caching
  • Faster activity tracking with improved loading mechanisms

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed session task name accuracy issues
  • Fixed non-functional complete shortcut
  • Eliminated slight delay in breathing exercise intro
  • Resolved inconsistent menu bar visibility
  • Fixed daily focus time discrepancies between floating timer and analytics
  • Corrected remaining task time inconsistencies across different screens
  • Fixed adjusted session time in Pomodoro mode starting from 1 minute
  • Resolved non-functional full screen break toggle in notification preferences
  • Fixed workspace not updating when switching tasks
